Theraphy session on the open road
Post No.2 Date: 24 April 2016 Categories:
Excerpt:

“Life is like driving a car at night. You can only see as far as your headlights, but you can make the entire journey that way.”

“Life is like driving a car at night. You can only see as far as your headlights, but you can make the entire journey that way.”
